metadata.title: CVE-2016-9449 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The taxonomy module in Drupal 7.x before 7.52 and 8.x before 8.2.3 mightallow remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information abouttaxonomy terms by leveraging inconsistent naming of access query tags.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
